actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, International Trade Commission, Office of the U.S. Trade Representative, Treasury Department, State Department, Commerce Department.

official_title: A resolution to express the sense of the Senate that the July 30, 1985, Trade Action Program of Japan, is inadequate.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Senate that: (1) the President should inform Japan that the trade action program of Japan is an insufficient response to the growing trade deficit; and (2) Japan should act to reduce certain trade barriers. Declares that the Senate, upon its return from the forthcoming recess, shall act on legislation to require the President to respond to unfair trade practices of Japan.

titles.title: A resolution to express the sense of the Senate that the July 30, 1985, Trade Action Program of Japan, is inadequate.
